SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Classes
Class
Description
AddUserController
The AddUserController class manages the user interface for adding a new user.
AdminPageController
The AdminPageController class manages the user interface and actions on the administrator page.
Album
The Album class represents a collection of pictures and provides methods to manage them.
AlbumController
Controller class for managing the display and actions related to a specific album.
CaptionController
The CaptionController class manages the user interface for captioning a selected photo.
CopyController
The CopyController class manages the user interface for copying a selected photo to another album.
CreateAlbumController
The CreateAlbumController class manages the user interface for creating a new album.
CreateSearchAlbumController
The CreateSearchAlbumController class manages the user interface for creating a new album from search results.
LoginController
The LoginController class handles user login attempts Redirects users to their respective home page or the admin to the admin page
MovePhotoController
The MovePhotoController class manages the user interface for moving a selected photo to another album.
PhotoDisplayController
The PhotoDisplayController class manages the user interface for displaying and navigating through photos, as well as handling photo-related actions such as adding and removing tags.
Photos
 
Picture
The Picture class represents an image file with associated metadata, including name, caption, file path, date and time of creation, formatted date and time, and a list of tags.
RenameAlbumController
The RenameAlbumController class handles user interactions related to renaming an album in the user interface.
SearchController
The SearchController class handles the user interface and logic for searching pictures in the photo application.
Tag
The Tag class represents a metadata tag with a name and a corresponding value.
TagController
The TagController class handles user interactions and logic related to creating tags for pictures.
User
Represents a user in UserList Each user has a unique identifier, a username, and a list of albums.
UserHomePageController
The UserHomePageController class controls the user's home page view.
UserList
UserList Class contains ArrayList of User Type Objects which each contain Album type objects which contain Picture Objects which contain Tag objects UserList > List of User > List of Album > List of Picture > List of Tag Each UserList has a unique Identifier and a list of Users
